title: Game is broken
body:
I was playing just now, and I couldn't anything.
Like, I was Kayle, and my skills just didn't work. I press E, nothing (I'm still melee). I can't Q anyone or W myself.
Fucking retarded shit, I could only basic attack,  and I'm not even sure if that was working.
Game is bugged to fuck.

replies.body:
Yeah, its a silly bug that happens every so often (especially to mac users). 
The best you can do is force a reset of your computer (since you can't even alt-tab). Luckily it doesn't happen too often. If it is happening to you a lot, I would recommend sending in a support ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=TKGB9Tjz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-21T01:38:19.908+0000)
>
> Yeah, its a silly bug that happens every so often (especially to mac users). 
> The best you can do is force a reset of your computer (since you can't even alt-tab). Luckily it doesn't happen too often. If it is happening to you a lot, I would recommend sending in a support ticket.

Nah, it's a random occurrence, one in a thousand games.
If it is just "something that happens sometimes", I can deal with it.
Cheers Yaiamone.
